attributes.action: Halt the sale of ChesterBus (formerly Chester City Transport Limited) until such time that the Council Tax payers of Chester have been properly consulted.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To the best of my knowlege, no consultation has taken place with the electors of Chester. Chester City Council hold ChesterBus in trust on behalf of the people of Chester. I do not think that they should have the authority to sell ChesterBus without a referendum having been conducted under the auspices of the Electoral Reform Society.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
